title: Subpart 175-2 - Transfers Of Juvenile Delinquents To Secure Facilities
content:
Subpart 175-2 - Transfers Of Juvenile Delinquents To Secure Facilities

State Regulations
§ 175-2.1 - Application
§ 175-2.2 - Guidelines for transfer
§ 175-2.3 - Notice and assistance to juvenile delinquent in a transfer hearing
§ 175-2.4 - Emergency transfer requests
§ 175-2.5 - Conduct of a transfer hearing

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
